name: desafio-corrida-desktop
description: Gerenciador offline de desafios de corrida

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix main && npm install --prefix renderer
scripts.dev:main: wait-on tcp:5173 && npm run dev --prefix main
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix renderer && npm run build --prefix main
scripts.dist:win: npm run build --prefix renderer && npm run dist:win --prefix main
